The Life of a Radar

Why I Help Others
 27 Nov 2007

Simply because of the great feeling you get when you suggest something to someone and they take it on board and compliment you for it, like this person:

Kathyscode wrote: Radar, I read through your 10 section Rails instructional this morning and really enjoyed it. Thank you! I thought you might be one of those exalted GODS that really know this stuff ...

Thanks Kathyskode!
